roadmap.title: Master Programming Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn a programming language like Python or Java, focusing on variables, loops, functions, and object-oriented programming to build a foundation for solving computing problems.

subtopics: What is programming and how computers work
Installing Python and setting up development environment
Variables and data types (strings, integers, floats, booleans)

resources.title: Programming for Everybody (Getting Started with Python)
Python Tutorial for Beginners - Full Course in 12 Hours
Introduction to Computer Science and Programming Using Python

practiceExercises: Create a program that asks for user's name and age, then prints a greeting
Build a simple calculator for basic arithmetic operations
Write a program to convert temperatures between Celsius and Fahrenheit
Create a grade calculator that assigns letter grades based on scores
Build a simple login system with username/password validation
Write a program to determine if a number is even/odd, positive/negative

subtopics: For loops and iterating through sequences

resources.title: For Loops in Python - Real Python

practiceExercises: Create a number guessing game with attempts counter
Build a pattern printer (pyramids, diamonds, etc.)

subtopics: Function scope and local vs global variables
Built-in functions and creating custom functions
practiceExercises: Create a function library for mathematical operations
Build a text formatting toolkit with multiple functions
Write functions to validate email addresses and phone numbers
Create a to-do list application with add, remove, and display features
Build a contact book to store and search contact information
Write a program to find duplicates in a list

subtopics: When to use different data structures
practiceExercises: Build a student grade management system using dictionaries
Create a word frequency counter from text input
Implement a simple inventory system for a store
Create a BankAccount class with deposit and withdraw methods
Build a Book class for a library management system
Design a Car class with properties and behaviors

subtopics: Reading from and writing to files
Working with different file formats (txt, csv)
practiceExercises: Create a note-taking app that saves to and loads from files
Build a simple expense tracker with data persistence
Write a log file analyzer that processes and summarizes data

milestonProject.title: Personal Budget Manager
milestonProject.description: Build a complete command-line application that manages personal finances with categories, transactions, and reports
requirements: Use classes to represent accounts and transactions
Implement functions for adding, editing, and deleting entries
Handle errors gracefully with proper exception handling

roadmap.title: Understand Computer Science Basics
roadmap.description: Study fundamental computer science concepts including data types, memory management, computational thinking, and basic algorithms to understand how computers process information.

weeks.topic: Introduction to Computer Science & Binary Systems
subtopics: What is computer science and why it matters
Binary number system and digital representation
How computers store and process data
practiceExercises: Convert decimal numbers to binary and vice versa
Calculate storage requirements for different data types

subtopics: What are algorithms and why they matter
practiceExercises: Write pseudocode for common problems (sorting, searching)
Analyze time complexity of simple algorithms

subtopics: How different data types are stored
practiceExercises: Draw memory diagrams for variable assignments
Identify memory leaks in sample code
Compare memory usage of different data structures

subtopics: Common complexity classes (O(1), O(n), O(log n), O(nÂ²))

resources.title: Big O Notation and Time Complexity
A Gentle Introduction to Algorithm Complexity Analysis

practiceExercises: Calculate Big O complexity for given algorithms
Compare efficiency of different solutions to same problem
Design ADT interfaces for common data structures

milestoneProject.title: Algorithm Visualizer
milestoneProject.description: Create a program that visualizes how basic algorithms work step-by-step, demonstrating computational thinking and algorithm analysis
requirements: Implement at least 3 sorting algorithms (bubble, selection, insertion)
Visualize algorithm steps with printed output
Display time complexity analysis for each algorithm
Compare performance with different input sizes

roadmap.title: Learn Data Structures and Algorithms
roadmap.description: Master essential data structures (arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs) and algorithms (sorting, searching, recursion) to solve complex programming problems efficiently.

practiceExercises: Solve two-sum problem using two pointers
Implement a singly linked list from scratch
Detect cycle in linked list (Floyd's algorithm)
Implement stack using arrays and linked lists
Build a queue using two stacks
Generate all permutations of a string

subtopics: Bubble sort, selection sort, insertion sort
practiceExercises: Implement all basic sorting algorithms from scratch
Compare performance of different sorting algorithms
Solve problems requiring custom sort comparators
Implement binary search iteratively and recursively
Find element in rotated sorted array
Implement a hash table from scratch
Solve two-sum problem using hash map
Build an LRU cache using hash map

resources.title: Binary Trees and Binary Search Trees

practiceExercises: Implement BST with insert, delete, search operations
Find height and diameter of binary tree

weeks.topic: Advanced Trees - Heaps, Tries & Graphs Intro
practiceExercises: Implement a min-heap and use it for heap sort
Build a trie for autocomplete functionality
Find shortest path using Dijkstra's algorithm
Solve graph problems on coding platforms

milestoneProject.title: Data Structure Library & Algorithm Visualizer
milestoneProject.description: Build a comprehensive library implementing all major data structures and create a command-line tool to visualize algorithm execution
requirements: Implement all data structures covered (array, linked list, stack, queue, tree, graph, hash table)
Include all major sorting and searching algorithms
Create visualization for at least 3 algorithms
Write unit tests for all implementations
Document time and space complexity for each operation
Build a CLI interface to demonstrate algorithms

roadmap.title: Learn Version Control with Git
roadmap.description: Master Git for version control, code collaboration, and managing project history. Essential for team development and professional software engineering.

practiceExercises: Initialize a Git repository and make commits

subtopics: Forking and contributing to open source

resources.title: How to Contribute to Open Source

practiceExercises: Create feature branches and merge them
Make a pull request to an open source project

subtopics: Interactive rebase and commit history editing
practiceExercises: Rebase a feature branch onto main
Use git stash to save work in progress
Create and push tags for releases

milestoneProject.title: Collaborative Open Source Contribution
milestoneProject.description: Contribute to a real open source project using Git and GitHub workflows
requirements: Create a feature branch for your contribution
Make meaningful commits with good commit messages
Submit a pull request with proper description

roadmap.title: Build Small Projects
roadmap.description: Apply your skills by creating projects like a to-do list app, calculator, or simple website to reinforce programming concepts and build a portfolio.

practiceExercises: Create CLI-based to-do list with add/remove/edit
Add priority levels and due dates
Build number guessing game with hints
Create hangman game with word list
Track income and expenses by category
Build weather app using OpenWeather API
Create price tracker for e-commerce products

milestoneProject.title: Personal Portfolio Website
milestoneProject.description: Create a personal portfolio website showcasing all your projects with descriptions, code, and documentation
requirements: Display all 5 completed projects with descriptions
Write clear README files for each project
Deploy portfolio website (GitHub Pages or similar)

roadmap.title: Explore a Specialization
roadmap.description: Choose a focus area like web development (React, Node.js), mobile development, or backend systems and learn relevant frameworks and technologies.

practiceExercises: Build mini projects (quiz app, weather app)

milestoneProject.title: Full Stack Social Media Platform
milestoneProject.description: Build a complete full stack application with frontend, backend, database, and deployment

roadmap.title: Learn Software Testing and Quality Assurance
roadmap.description: Understand testing methodologies, unit testing, integration testing, and debugging to ensure software reliability and quality.

practiceExercises: Write unit tests for previous projects
Write E2E tests for web app

weeks.topic: Debugging, Performance Testing & QA Best Practices
practiceExercises: Set up linting and code quality tools

milestoneProject.title: Comprehensive Test Suite for Previous Project
milestoneProject.description: Create complete testing infrastructure for your full stack project

roadmap.title: Understand Software Security Best Practices
roadmap.description: Learn secure coding practices, common vulnerabilities (SQL injection, XSS), authentication, and authorization to build secure applications.

milestoneProject.title: Secure Full Stack Application
milestoneProject.description: Rebuild or enhance previous project with comprehensive security features

roadmap.title: Build a Professional Portfolio
roadmap.description: Create a portfolio website showcasing 3-5 significant projects, demonstrating your technical skills, problem-solving abilities, and coding standards.

resources.title: How to Build a Developer Portfolio

milestoneProject.title: Complete Professional Portfolio
milestoneProject.description: Fully deployed portfolio website with polished projects and professional online presence

roadmap.title: Prepare for Technical Interviews
roadmap.description: Practice coding challenges, system design, behavioral questions, and interview techniques to prepare for software engineering job interviews.

milestoneProject.title: Interview Ready Checklist
milestoneProject.description: Comprehensive preparation demonstrating interview readiness

roadmap.title: Learn Design Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Master core design principles including color theory, typography, composition, visual hierarchy, and layout to create effective visual communications.

weeks.topic: Introduction to Graphic Design & Design Thinking
subtopics: What is graphic design and its role in communication
practiceExercises: Analyze 10 designs and identify design principles used
Create a mood board for a fictional brand
Practice design thinking process on a simple problem

subtopics: Color wheel, primary, secondary, and tertiary colors
Color harmony and schemes (complementary, analogous, triadic)
practiceExercises: Create 5 different color palettes for different moods
Design a poster using only one color scheme

subtopics: Font families and classifications (serif, sans-serif, script)
practiceExercises: Create typographic poster using only text
Design a magazine spread focusing on typography

subtopics: Rule of thirds and golden ratio
Creating visual flow and focal points
practiceExercises: Redesign 3 existing posters using different grid systems
Create layouts emphasizing different focal points
Design a brochure using visual hierarchy principles

milestoneProject.title: Design Principles Portfolio Piece
milestoneProject.description: Create a comprehensive design project demonstrating mastery of all fundamental principles
requirements: Demonstrate color theory with intentional palette
Show typography skills with clear hierarchy
Use grid system and proper composition
Present design rationale for all choices

roadmap.title: Master Design Software
roadmap.description: Learn industry-standard tools including Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and Figma for creating professional digital designs and prototypes.

milestoneProject.title: Complete Brand Design Package
milestoneProject.description: Create comprehensive brand materials using all software tools

roadmap.title: Study User Experience (UX) Basics
roadmap.description: Learn UX principles, user research methods, information architecture, and user-centered design to create designs that solve real user problems.

practiceExercises: Map user journey for familiar app

milestoneProject.title: Complete UX Case Study
milestoneProject.description: Conduct full UX process from research to tested prototype

roadmap.title: Learn Visual Branding and Identity
roadmap.description: Understand brand strategy, logo design, visual identity systems, and brand guidelines to create cohesive brand experiences.

milestoneProject.title: Complete Brand Identity Package
milestoneProject.description: Design full brand identity from strategy to guidelines
requirements: Brand applications (business card, letterhead, social media)

roadmap.title: Learn Web and Digital Design
roadmap.description: Understand responsive design, mobile-first approach, accessibility standards, and web design best practices for digital platforms.

practiceExercises: Code 3 static web pages from designs

milestoneProject.title: Responsive Portfolio Website
milestoneProject.description: Design and code fully responsive, accessible portfolio

roadmap.title: Explore Design Ethics and Accessibility
roadmap.description: Learn ethical design practices, inclusive design principles, accessibility standards (WCAG), and designing for diverse user groups.

milestoneProject.title: Accessible App Redesign
milestoneProject.description: Redesign existing app with focus on accessibility and inclusion

roadmap.title: Create Portfolio Design Projects
roadmap.description: Build a diverse portfolio by designing logos, posters, social media graphics, and UI mockups to practice applying design principles.

practiceExercises: Present designs to peers for feedback

milestoneProject.title: Diverse Design Portfolio
milestoneProject.description: Complete portfolio with variety of design work

roadmap.title: Learn Design Systems
roadmap.description: Master design systems, component libraries, design tokens, and collaborative design tools for team-based projects.

milestoneProject.title: Complete Design System
milestoneProject.description: Build comprehensive design system for web/mobile project

roadmap.title: Build a Professional Portfolio
roadmap.description: Create a compelling online portfolio showcasing your best work, process documentation, and case studies demonstrating problem-solving skills.

milestoneProject.title: Complete Professional Portfolio
milestoneProject.description: Fully launched portfolio with comprehensive case studies

roadmap.title: Gain Real-World Experience
roadmap.description: Start freelancing, contribute to open-source design projects, or pursue internships to build professional experience and expand your network.

milestoneProject.description: Build experience through multiple channels

roadmap.title: Learn Programming and Statistics
roadmap.description: Master Python programming (NumPy, Pandas) and fundamental statistics (probability, distributions, hypothesis testing) to analyze and interpret data effectively.

resources.title: Introduction to Python for Data Science

milestoneProject.title: Exploratory Data Analysis Project
milestoneProject.description: Complete statistical analysis of real-world dataset

roadmap.title: Master Data Manipulation and SQL
roadmap.description: Learn SQL for database queries and data wrangling with Pandas to clean, transform, and prepare datasets for analysis.

milestoneProject.title: Database Analysis Project
milestoneProject.description: Analyze large database using SQL and Pandas

roadmap.title: Learn Machine Learning Basics
roadmap.description: Understand fundamental ML algorithms including regression, classification, clustering, and decision trees using scikit-learn.

milestoneProject.description: Build complete ML solution from data to deployment

roadmap.title: Master Data Visualization
roadmap.description: Learn to create compelling data visualizations using Matplotlib, Seaborn, and interactive tools to communicate insights effectively.

milestoneProject.description: Build comprehensive dashboard with multiple visualizations

roadmap.description: Deep dive into statistical inference, Bayesian methods, experimental design, and A/B testing for data-driven decision making.

milestoneProject.description: Conduct statistical analysis with experiments and predictions

roadmap.description: Master neural networks, CNNs, RNNs, and frameworks like TensorFlow and PyTorch for advanced machine learning applications.

milestoneProject.description: Build end-to-end deep learning solution for computer vision or NLP

roadmap.title: Master Big Data Technologies
roadmap.description: Learn distributed computing with Apache Spark, Hadoop ecosystem, and cloud platforms for processing large-scale datasets.

subtopics: Big data characteristics (Volume, Velocity, Variety, Veracity)
Big data use cases and ecosystem overview

resources.title: Introduction to Big Data with Spark and Hadoop

practiceExercises: Set up a local Hadoop single-node cluster
Write a simple MapReduce word count program
Explore HDFS commands and file operations

subtopics: Spark architecture and components (Driver, Executors, Cluster Manager)

resources.title: Big Data Analysis with Scala and Spark

practiceExercises: Create RDDs from various data sources
Build a simple data processing pipeline with Spark
Load and explore large CSV/JSON files with PySpark
Use window functions for time-series analysis

weeks.topic: Spark MLlib & Machine Learning at Scale

resources.title: Distributed Machine Learning with Apache Spark

practiceExercises: Build an ML pipeline with feature transformers
Train a classification model on distributed data

weeks.topic: Cloud Platforms - AWS for Big Data
subtopics: AWS EMR (Elastic MapReduce) setup and configuration
S3 for data storage and management

resources.title: AWS Certified Big Data - Specialty Prep

practiceExercises: Launch an EMR cluster and run a Spark job
Use S3 as data lake and perform ETL with Glue
Query data in S3 using Athena

weeks.topic: Cloud Platforms - Azure & GCP for Big Data

resources.title: Google Cloud Big Data and Machine Learning Fundamentals

practiceExercises: Create a Databricks workspace and run notebooks
Use BigQuery to analyze large datasets
Compare performance across AWS, Azure, and GCP
Set up a Kafka cluster and produce/consume messages
Build a real-time analytics pipeline with Spark Streaming
Implement windowing and aggregations on streaming data

subtopics: Building data pipelines with Apache Airflow
practiceExercises: Design a star schema for a business domain
Create Airflow DAGs for data ingestion
Implement data quality checks in pipelines
Profile a Spark application and identify bottlenecks
Optimize data partitioning for join operations
Tune memory allocation and executor configuration

subtopics: Delta Lake fundamentals and ACID transactions
practiceExercises: Create Delta tables and perform CRUD operations
Use time travel to query historical data
Implement schema evolution in production scenarios
Set up role-based access control for data resources
Implement data encryption at rest and in transit
Create a data lineage diagram for a pipeline

subtopics: Edge computing and IoT data processing
Future trends in big data technologies
practiceExercises: Build a graph analytics application with GraphX
Explore emerging technologies through research papers

milestoneProject.title: Big Data Analytics Platform
milestoneProject.description: Build a complete big data platform using Spark, cloud services, and streaming technologies. Process large-scale datasets (100GB+), implement real-time analytics, optimize performance, and deploy on a cloud platform with proper governance and security.
tasks: Design scalable architecture for batch and streaming data
Implement ETL pipelines with Airflow and PySpark
Build real-time dashboard with Kafka and Spark Streaming
Optimize Spark jobs and tune performance
Deploy on cloud platform (AWS/Azure/GCP) with security controls

roadmap.title: Work on Real-World Projects
roadmap.description: Build end-to-end data science projects involving data collection, cleaning, modeling, and deployment to demonstrate practical skills.

subtopics: Defining problem statements and success metrics
Data collection strategies (APIs, web scraping, databases)
Ethics and legal considerations for data usage
Setting up project repositories and version control
practiceExercises: Define a project idea with clear objectives and metrics
Collect data from multiple sources (API, CSV, database)
Set up GitHub repository with proper structure
Perform thorough EDA on your collected data
Generate insights report with statistical analysis
Clean dataset and handle all missing values
Engineer new features based on domain knowledge

subtopics: Choosing appropriate algorithms for problem type
practiceExercises: Train multiple models and compare performance
Perform grid search for hyperparameter optimization
Generate SHAP plots for feature importance
Deploy NLP model as REST API
Deploy computer vision model with inference API
Implement collaborative filtering with matrix factorization
Apply multiple clustering algorithms and compare
Visualize clusters in 2D with dimensionality reduction
Write comprehensive documentation for all projects
Create presentation deck for portfolio project
Build personal data science portfolio website

milestoneProject.title: Comprehensive Data Science Portfolio
milestoneProject.description: Build a portfolio of 6 diverse data science projects covering predictive analytics, NLP, computer vision, time series, recommendation systems, and clustering. Each project should demonstrate end-to-end capabilities from data collection to deployment, with thorough documentation and presentation materials.
tasks: Document each project with README, notebooks, and reports
Deploy at least 2 projects as web applications or APIs
Create portfolio website showcasing all projects
Prepare presentation materials for each project
Write blog posts explaining methodologies and insights

roadmap.title: Learn MLOps and Model Deployment

practiceExercises: Use Vertex AI for training and deployment

milestoneProject.description: Build complete MLOps system with automated training, deployment, monitoring, and retraining. Deploy model to cloud with CI/CD, implement monitoring and alerting, and demonstrate production-grade ML operations.
tasks: Set up MLflow for experiment tracking
Set up model monitoring and alerts

roadmap.title: Build Portfolio and Gain Experience
roadmap.description: Create a comprehensive portfolio on GitHub showcasing diverse data science projects, and pursue internships or freelance work.

resources.title: Build Portfolio Website with GitHub Pages

milestoneProject.description: Build comprehensive professional portfolio with website, optimized GitHub profile, blog posts, Kaggle presence, and apply to real opportunities. Demonstrate end-to-end career readiness with projects, networking, and professional materials.

roadmap.title: Learn Software Testing Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Understand testing principles, test levels (unit, integration, system), test types (functional, non-functional), and the software development lifecycle.

practiceExercises: Identify test levels in sample project
Map testing activities to SDLC phases

milestoneProject.title: Testing Fundamentals Assessment
milestoneProject.description: Complete comprehensive assessment covering testing concepts, SDLC, test levels, and principles. Create a testing strategy document for a sample application.

roadmap.title: Master Manual Testing Techniques
roadmap.description: Learn test case design, test execution, bug reporting, and defect lifecycle management using industry-standard practices.

practiceExercises: Write 20 test cases for login page
Design test cases for e-commerce checkout

milestoneProject.title: Complete Manual Testing Project
milestoneProject.description: Perform end-to-end manual testing of a web application. Design test cases, execute tests, report bugs, and create comprehensive test documentation.
requirements: Write 50+ test cases using various techniques
Execute test cases and track results
Create test summary report with metrics

roadmap.title: Learn Test Automation Basics
roadmap.description: Understand automation frameworks, learn Selenium WebDriver for web testing, and write automated test scripts using Python or Java.

milestoneProject.title: Automated Test Framework
milestoneProject.description: Build a complete Selenium automation framework with Page Object Model, data-driven tests, reporting, and CI/CD integration. Automate at least 30 test scenarios.

roadmap.title: Master API Testing
roadmap.description: Learn REST API testing using Postman, REST Assured, and understand API documentation, authentication, and validation.

subtopics: HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH)
practiceExercises: Identify REST principles in public APIs

subtopics: Authentication methods (Basic, Bearer Token, API Key)
Writing automated API tests in Java

practiceExercises: Create API test cases from Swagger specs

milestoneProject.title: Comprehensive API Testing Framework
milestoneProject.description: Build a complete API testing framework using Postman and REST Assured. Test a real-world API with authentication, validate responses, automate 50+ test scenarios, and generate reports.

roadmap.title: Learn Performance Testing
roadmap.description: Master performance testing concepts, load testing, stress testing, and tools like JMeter for measuring application performance.

subtopics: Load vs stress vs spike testing
practiceExercises: Identify performance requirements for web app

milestoneProject.title: Complete Performance Testing Project
milestoneProject.description: Conduct end-to-end performance testing for a web application. Create test plans, execute load/stress tests with JMeter, monitor application performance, analyze results, and provide optimization recommendations.

roadmap.title: Study Agile and DevOps Testing
roadmap.description: Understand testing in Agile methodologies, continuous testing, CI/CD pipelines, and test-driven development (TDD).

milestoneProject.description: Build a comprehensive CI/CD pipeline with automated testing. Implement TDD/BDD practices, create Jenkins/GitHub Actions pipeline, integrate automated tests, set up quality gates, and demonstrate continuous testing.

roadmap.description: Master mobile testing tools like Appium, understand iOS/Android testing differences, and test responsive designs.

milestoneProject.description: Build an Appium-based mobile test automation framework for both Android and iOS. Test native mobile apps, implement cross-platform testing, use cloud testing platforms, and create comprehensive test reports.

roadmap.title: Master Test Management and Planning
roadmap.description: Learn test strategy, test planning, risk-based testing, and test management tools for organizing QA activities.

milestoneProject.description: Lead a test management initiative from planning to execution. Create test strategy, test plan, manage team, track metrics, report status, and implement process improvements.

roadmap.description: Create a portfolio demonstrating various testing projects, automation frameworks, bug reports, and test documentation.

milestoneProject.description: Build a comprehensive QA portfolio showcasing diverse testing projects, automation frameworks, performance testing, security testing, and professional documentation. Create portfolio website and prepare for job applications.

roadmap.description: Pursue ISTQB certification, contribute to open-source testing, and seek internships or junior QA positions.

roadmap.description: Master statistics, data types, descriptive analytics, data cleaning, and fundamental analytical thinking.

milestoneProject.title: Business Data Analysis Report
milestoneProject.description: Analyze real business dataset, clean data, perform statistical analysis, and present findings.

roadmap.title: Master SQL and Database Querying
roadmap.description: Learn advanced SQL, joins, aggregations, subqueries, window functions, and database optimization for analytics.

milestoneProject.title: Business Analytics Database Project
milestoneProject.description: Design analytics database, write complex SQL queries for business metrics, optimize for performance.

roadmap.title: Learn Data Visualization Tools
roadmap.description: Master business intelligence tools like Tableau, Power BI, creating dashboards, charts, and visual storytelling with data.

milestoneProject.title: Executive BI Dashboard
milestoneProject.description: Create comprehensive business intelligence dashboard in Tableau and Power BI with multiple visualizations.

roadmap.title: Master Excel and Spreadsheet Analytics
roadmap.description: Learn advanced Excel functions, pivot tables, macros, data analysis tools, and spreadsheet-based reporting.

milestoneProject.title: Automated Excel Reporting System
milestoneProject.description: Build automated reporting system in Excel with macros, pivot tables, and dynamic dashboards.

roadmap.title: Master Business Analytics Concepts
roadmap.description: Learn business metrics, KPIs, financial analysis, customer analytics, and aligning data insights with business strategy.

milestoneProject.title: Business Performance Analysis
milestoneProject.description: Analyze company performance using business metrics, identify improvement opportunities, present to stakeholders.

roadmap.title: Master Data Warehousing
roadmap.description: Learn data warehouse concepts, ETL processes, dimensional modeling, star schemas, and data integration.

milestoneProject.title: Data Warehouse Design & Implementation
milestoneProject.description: Design and implement dimensional data warehouse with ETL pipeline for business analytics.

roadmap.title: Learn Python for Data Analysis
roadmap.description: Master Python, Pandas, NumPy for data manipulation, analysis automation, and integrating Python with BI tools.

milestoneProject.title: Automated Analytics Pipeline
milestoneProject.description: Build Python-based automated analytics pipeline with data extraction, analysis, and reporting.

roadmap.title: Master Reporting and Dashboard Design
roadmap.description: Learn report design principles, interactive dashboards, data storytelling, and effective communication of insights.

milestoneProject.title: Executive Dashboard Suite
milestoneProject.description: Design comprehensive dashboard suite with multiple views, interactivity, and data storytelling.

roadmap.title: Build BI Portfolio with Real Projects
roadmap.description: Create diverse analytics projects, dashboards, reports demonstrating business insights and data-driven recommendations.

milestoneProject.title: Comprehensive BI Portfolio
milestoneProject.description: Build complete BI portfolio showcasing diverse analytics projects with business impact.

roadmap.title: Gain Professional BI Experience
roadmap.description: Build real-world experience, pursue BI certifications, and seek business intelligence analyst positions.

milestoneProject.title: BI Analyst Career Launch
milestoneProject.description: Complete certifications, build professional network, secure BI analyst position.

roadmap.title: Learn Software Testing Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Master testing principles, SDLC, test levels, test types, and quality assurance basics.

milestoneProject.title: Testing Fundamentals Assessment
milestoneProject.description: Complete comprehensive testing fundamentals project demonstrating understanding of testing principles.

roadmap.title: Master Test Case Design
roadmap.description: Learn test case writing, boundary value analysis, equivalence partitioning, decision tables, and test design techniques.

milestoneProject.title: Comprehensive Test Suite
milestoneProject.description: Design complete test suite using multiple test design techniques for a real application.

roadmap.title: Learn Manual Testing Techniques
roadmap.description: Master exploratory testing, regression testing, smoke testing, sanity testing, and manual test execution.

milestoneProject.title: Full Manual Testing Cycle
milestoneProject.description: Execute complete manual testing cycle on a real application including all testing types.

roadmap.title: Master Bug Tracking and Reporting
roadmap.description: Learn defect lifecycle, bug reporting best practices, using bug tracking tools, and effective communication with developers.

milestoneProject.title: Bug Tracking System Mastery
milestoneProject.description: Demonstrate proficiency in bug tracking by managing complete defect lifecycle in JIRA.

roadmap.title: Learn Test Automation Basics
roadmap.description: Master automation frameworks, Selenium WebDriver, writing automated tests, and understanding when to automate.

milestoneProject.title: Automated Test Suite
milestoneProject.description: Build comprehensive automated test suite using Selenium with proper framework structure.

roadmap.title: Master API and Web Services Testing
roadmap.description: Learn REST API testing, Postman, API validation, integration testing, and web services fundamentals.

milestoneProject.title: Complete API Test Suite
milestoneProject.description: Build comprehensive API test suite with automated tests and documentation.

roadmap.title: Learn Agile Testing Practices
roadmap.description: Master testing in Agile/Scrum, sprint testing, continuous testing, and collaboration in Agile teams.

milestoneProject.title: Agile Testing Portfolio
milestoneProject.description: Demonstrate Agile testing proficiency through complete sprint cycle participation.

roadmap.title: Master Mobile and Cross-Browser Testing
roadmap.description: Learn mobile app testing, responsive design testing, cross-browser compatibility, and device testing strategies.

milestoneProject.title: Multi-Platform Test Suite
milestoneProject.description: Build comprehensive test suite covering mobile, responsive, and cross-browser testing.

roadmap.title: Build QA Testing Portfolio
roadmap.description: Create comprehensive testing portfolio demonstrating manual, automated, API, and mobile testing skills.

milestoneProject.title: Complete QA Portfolio
milestoneProject.description: Build comprehensive portfolio showcasing diverse testing skills and projects.

roadmap.title: Gain Professional QA Experience
roadmap.description: Build real-world testing experience, pursue QA certifications, and launch QA tester career.

milestoneProject.title: QA Career Launch
milestoneProject.description: Complete certifications, gain real experience, secure QA tester position.

roadmap.title: Learn IT and Networking Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Master networking protocols (TCP/IP, DNS, HTTP), OSI model, operating systems, and IT infrastructure basics.

milestoneProject.title: Network Lab Setup
milestoneProject.description: Build home lab with multiple networked systems demonstrating networking and OS fundamentals.

roadmap.title: Master Cybersecurity Fundamentals
roadmap.description: Learn security principles, CIA triad, threat landscape, attack vectors, and foundational security concepts.

milestoneProject.title: Security Assessment Report
milestoneProject.description: Conduct security assessment of a system and create comprehensive report.

roadmap.title: Learn Operating System Security
roadmap.description: Master Linux/Windows security, hardening, access controls, user management, and OS-level security configurations.

milestoneProject.title: OS Hardening Implementation
milestoneProject.description: Implement comprehensive security hardening on Linux and Windows systems.

roadmap.title: Master Network Security
roadmap.description: Learn firewalls, IDS/IPS, VPNs, network segmentation, encryption, and securing network infrastructure.

milestoneProject.title: Secure Network Design
milestoneProject.description: Design and implement secure network architecture with multiple security layers.

roadmap.title: Learn Cryptography and Encryption
roadmap.description: Master symmetric/asymmetric encryption, hashing, digital signatures, PKI, SSL/TLS, and cryptographic protocols.

milestoneProject.title: Cryptographic Implementation Project
milestoneProject.description: Build secure application using encryption, hashing, and digital signatures.

roadmap.title: Master Ethical Hacking and Penetration Testing
roadmap.description: Learn vulnerability assessment, penetration testing methodologies, exploitation techniques, and security tools.

milestoneProject.title: Penetration Testing Report
milestoneProject.description: Conduct comprehensive penetration test and create professional report.

roadmap.title: Learn Security Operations and Incident Response
roadmap.description: Master SIEM tools, log analysis, incident detection, response procedures, and security monitoring.

milestoneProject.title: SOC Operations Simulation
milestoneProject.description: Build SOC environment and conduct simulated incident response.

roadmap.title: Master Cloud Security
roadmap.description: Learn AWS/Azure/GCP security, cloud architecture security, IAM, compliance, and securing cloud workloads.

milestoneProject.title: Secure Cloud Architecture
milestoneProject.description: Design and implement secure multi-tier cloud application.

roadmap.title: Build Cybersecurity Portfolio
roadmap.description: Create security projects, vulnerability assessments, penetration testing reports, and document security implementations.

milestoneProject.title: Comprehensive Security Portfolio
milestoneProject.description: Build portfolio showcasing diverse cybersecurity skills and projects.

roadmap.title: Gain Professional Security Experience
roadmap.description: Pursue security certifications (Security+, CEH, CISSP), participate in CTF challenges, and seek cybersecurity positions.

milestoneProject.title: Cybersecurity Career Launch
milestoneProject.description: Complete certifications, gain real security experience, secure cybersecurity position.
